name: Cheats 4 Hire
description: Put your cheating skills to the test and become a hero to your class! An increasing number of students are hopelessly flunking the exams at Travian High School. The only solution: cheating! With the help of the cheerleader, convince other as yet undecided students to aid you in your endeavors: Copy and distribute the answers with the...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or Greater Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible Graphics card (shader model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1.3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Fun game to play. Very original plot. Not very educational though...
Cheats 4 Hire is a very nice and pretty game. The graphics are gorgeous and fit the game very well. What I like most about the game is the fresh concept.  It is well worth the price!
